hero.title: AI Teacher
hero.subtitle: An AI-powered teaching platform. Teachers create classes and upload materials; students enroll and ask questions. The chatbot answers using only your course content.

forTeachers.title: For teachers
forTeachers.description: Register, create classes and subjects, and upload learning materials. Students see only what you publish; the AI uses your content to answer questions.

forStudents.title: For students
forStudents.description: Sign up, enroll in classes, and ask questions in a chat. Answers are grounded in the subject's uploaded content (RAG), not the open internet.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: The AI chatbot streams responses and uses only the course materials you or your teacher have added. More features—like an animated 3D teacher avatar—are planned.
